original_text: Paul lived in a house in Rome for two years. He paid money to live in the house. Many people came to visit him there. He was very happy to see them all.
korean_text: 바울이 온 이태를 자기 셋집에 머물면서 자기에게 오는 사람을 다 영접하고

sentences.original_text: Paul lived in a house in Rome
He paid money to live in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 집에서 살기 위해 돈을 지불했습니다

sentences.original_text: Many people came to visit him there
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 사람들이 그를 만나러 그곳에 왔습니다

sentences.original_text: He was very happy to see them all
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들 모두를 보고 매우 기뻤습니다
